snippet.title: Super Mario 64 in Sonic Generations - Chemical Plant Act 1 & 2
snippet.description:
This is NOT an April Fool's joke, Skyth literally put Super Mario 64 into Sonic Generations, the result is hilarious, amazing, and absolutely frustrating to beat levels with it but this is way too surreal.

Not all levels are beatable with the "normal" way, luckily Skyth has added unlimited wing cap and a way to go out of bounce while in 2D, but utilizing them is still extremely hard and you have to be really creative on what route you are taking. I also try to avoid using Free Cam teleport at all, but not sure how long I can go without.

0:00 Act 1 (BEATEN)
3:39 Act 2 (BEATEN)

Download the mod here:
https://gamebanana.com/mods/368411
